name: Crochet Girls Adjustable Diaper Cover: 0-6M K1010
description:
Crochet Girls Diaper Cover with a little monkey button. The waist band is adjustable with 2 hidden buttons for a comfortable fit.

-Size: 0-6months
-Colors: Pink Poodle
-Button:1 Wodden monkey button and 2 hidden plastic buttons
-Made with love in USA

This yarn is soft and made of 100% Premium Acrylic.
 
Product Care Instructions: Machine wash. Initial water temperature should not exceed 40C or 105F. No bleach product may be used. A machine dryer may be regularly used at the hottest available temperature setting. Item may not be smoothed or finished with an iron. 

*Click Pictures to enlarge

description:

Fabric & Care:
-100% cotton
-Machine wash
-Made with love in USA

Overview:

-Side Zipper
-Bodice is lined
-Ruffles front and back
-Skirt is shirred

Weight: 29-32    32-35    35-41

Bust:      20.5”      21.5”      22.5”

name: Toddler Leg Warmers-Natural Heather: K1011
description:
Adorable Crochet Leg Warmers with buttons for size 2T - 4T.

-Approx Length: 8 1/4"
-Approx Width: 3"
-Made with love in USA
-Available Colors: Natural Heather


This yarn is soft with a warm blend of lambs wool and easy care acrylic. Each pair has 2 non-functional buttons.

Product Care Instructions: Machine wash. Initial water temperature should not exceed 40C or 105F. Dry Clean, any solvent. No bleach product may be used. A machine dryer may be regularly used at the hottest available temperature setting. Item may not be smoothed or finished with an iron.

*Click Pictures to enlarge

name: Crochet Bow Hair Clips: K1009
description:
Crochet Bow Hair Clips comes with 2 hair clips. 

-Available Colors: 
Coral & Peacock
Magenta & Raspberry
Heather Grey & Oxford

-Clip: Gold
-Approx. 3" wide
-Made with love in USA


This yarn is soft with 100% Merino Wool
 
Product Care Instructions: Items made from this yarn may be laundered through the use of water, detergent or soap and gentle hand manipulation. Any dry cleaning solvent other than trichloroethylene may be safely used. No bleach product may be used. Lay out horizontally for drying. Regular ironing, steam or dry, may be performed at Low setting (110C, 230F) only. 

*Click Pictures to enlarge
